card.action.description: Represents your character abilities. They typically have a basic effect that can be used for free and a more powerful effect that requires Mana of a certain color to activate. When mana is required ANY Mana can be used: - Mana Essence generated by your effects this round - Mana Essence that exists ambiently in the environment can be drawn from (limited use as indicated) - Mana Crystals that the player collected in their inventory or generated by other effects. Some abilities require additional mana or to discard/throw this card or others to activate even more powerful effects. More Cards can be acquired via Exploring and Leveling up.
card.action.name: Action
card.activated.before_battle.description: The Card has been <style="status">Activated</style> before the Battle started and cannot be changed now.
card.activated.for_payment.description: The Card has been Used for Payment of other Cards and Effects and cannot be activated unless you Deactivate the other entity that uses it.
card.artifact.description: Relics are unique artifacts that your character has acquired while exploring. They have a basic (albeit) powerful effect that can be used multiple times throughout the game and an extremely powerful effect that can be used by Destroying the Relic. Some relics advanced action must be attached to one of your disciples instead. Relics can be detached at the campfire to get the relic card back into your hand.
card.artifact.name: Relic
card.artifact.throw.tooltip.content:
Using these effects requires the Relic be <style="sacrifice">Sacrified</style> to activate.

The card will be <style="sacrifice">Permanently Destroyed</style> and no longer usable throughout the rest of the Crusade.
card.artifact.purchase.btn.label: Acquire
card.starter.icon.tooltip.title: Starter Card
card.starter.icon.tooltip.description: This card is part of the deck of Ability Cards your Character was born with. Some Effects, Cards or Blessings target or exclude these cards specifically, but they otherwise behave like any other Action card.
card.cost.discard.description: Ability or effect that requires a card be <style="status">Discarded</style> to activate. The card will be moved to the Discard Pile and become usable again at the next Day/Night phase.
card.location.hand.name: Hand
card.location.hand.empty: No more cards in <style="value">Hand</style>. If you still have cards in your <style="value">Deck</style> you can <style="status">End your Turn</style> to draw back to your Hand Size. Otherwise you must <style="status">Sleep</style> to recover all of your cards from the <style="value">Discard</style> pile.
card.location.discard_pile.name: Discard Pile
card.location.draw_pile.name: Deck
card.location.draw_pile.empty: No more cards to <style="status">Draw</style>. You must rely on the cards in your <style="value">Hand</style>. You can also <style="status">Sleep</style> to recover all of your cards from the <style="value">Discard</style> pile.
card.cost.discard.name: <style="status">Discard</style>
card.cost.throw.description:

The card will be <style="sacrifice">Permanently Destroyed</style> and no longer usable throughout the rest of the Crusade.

card.deactivation.content: You are about to Deactivate the effects and side-effects triggered by this Card. You can Reactivate them by clicking on the corresponding Card Effects again. Continue?

card.invalid_player_status.description: The Card cannot be activated either due to the player being <style="paralyze">Paralyzed</style>, <style="status">Knocked-Out</style> or other status effects.
card.locked.title: Card cannot be activated
card.reactivation.content: To Activate these effects you are about to Deactivate the previous effects and side-effects triggered by this Card. Continue?

card.not_activated.description: You need to <style="status">Activate</style> this Card before you can apply this effect.
card.slot.advanced.description: The Advanced slot is typically the bottom ability of a card, except for Relics.
card.slot.advanced.name: Advanced Effects
card.slot.basic.description: The <style="value">Basic</style> slot is typically the top ability of a card.
card.slot.basic.name: Basic Effects
card.slot.none.name: None
card.slot.tapped.description:
The Default Effects are basic effects that can be activated irregardless of the card type (except <style="wound">Wounds</style>).

Typically:
- Move <style="value">1</style>,
- Reputation <style="value">1</style>
- Attack <style="value">1</style> (Physical)
- Block <style="value">1</style> (Physical)
card.slot.tapped.name: Default Effects
card.slot.throw.description: The <style="sacrifice">Sacrifice</style> slot is the bottom ability of all Relic cards that requires the Relic to be <style="sacrifice">Destroyed</style> to activate it.
card.slot.throw.name: Sacrifice Effects
card.spell.description: Spells are powerful incantations that your character discovered on their journey. They typically have a basic effect that can be used by paying a Mana and a more powerful effect that requires an additional Black Mana to activate. When paying mana any Mana can be used: - Mana Essence generated by your effects this round - Mana Essence that exists ambiently in the environment can be drawn from (limited use as indicated) - Mana Crystals that the player collected in their inventory or generated by other effects. Some abilities require additional mana or to discard/throw this card or others to activate even more powerful effects. More Spells can be acquired via Exploring.
card.spell.name: Spell
card.wound.description:
<style="wound">Wounds</style> are clogging the player hand.


They reduce the number of cards that can be held as they count towards the hand size limit.


<style="wound">Wounds</style> can be healed via effects or at certain locations in the game. They will be shuffled back into the deck at the end of the Day/Night phase.
card.wound.name: Wound
card.wound.heal.1.label: Heal <style="wound">1</style>
